programme.title: John Wayne obituary, 1979
programme.short_synopsis: John Wayne - obituary for an enduring hero.
programme.medium_synopsis: Remembering John Wayne, the actor who came to stand for something fundamentally good - and American.
programme.long_synopsis:
Remembering John Wayne, the actor who came to stand for something fundamentally good - and American.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
